18 AMAZON SUSTAINABILITY    ABOUT
Around the Globe
From building our largest wind farm in rural Texas to supporting women’s 
empowerment programs for our suppliers in Cambodia, Amazon’s sustainability 
efforts are happening all around the globe. amzn.to/around-the-globe
INDIA  
India’s packaging-free 
shipping program has 
expanded to 100+ cities 
across the country.
JAPAN  
850 Sustainability 
Ambassadors are creating  
a culture of sustainability  
in Japan.
GERMANY  
100% of Amazon-
shipped packaging  
is recyclable.
UNITED KINGDOM  
1808 charities received 
Amazon product donations 
in 2019 through our 
partnership with In  
Kind Direct.
ITALY  
4 operations facilities are 
powered by solar energy 
through on-site solar 
installations.
AUSTRALIA 
Our first Australian 
renewable energy project 
will produce the annual 
electricity of ~23,000 
average local households.
